name: kccg-validation-reporter
title: Validation Reporter (KCCG)
summary: Create a WGS validation report from a VCF of NA12878 calls

inputSpec.name: vcfgz
inputSpec.label: Variants
inputSpec.help: Input NA12878 genotype calls to be validated, in vcf.gz format.

inputSpec.name: region
inputSpec.label: Region BED
inputSpec.help: Limit analysis to the regions in this BED only.

inputSpec.name: sampleIDs
inputSpec.label: VCF sample IDs
inputSpec.help: Generate reports for these samples in the VCF only.  Comma-separated list; * indicates all samples.

inputSpec.name: runtests
inputSpec.label: Run integration tests?
inputSpec.help: Run integration tests during calculations.  For build use only.

outputSpec.label: Validation report PDF
outputSpec.help: A PDF of the validation report
outputSpec.name: report

outputSpec.label: Validation report data RDS
outputSpec.help: An RDS representation of the data used to generate the validation report
outputSpec.name: rds

outputSpec.label: Validation report summary JSON
outputSpec.help: A JSON representation of the summary results of the validation report
outputSpec.name: json
